OCD.name: TruTest Proxy
OCD.description: Provides proxy connection and data transfer to and from TruTest livestock scale head indicators.

AD.name: Connection uri
AD.description: URI to connect to the TruTest Indicator. Example socket://192.168.0.118:3001

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Stable weight measurement error
AD.description: Value of mesurement error to use for weights reported by the indicator as stable.

AD.name: Unstable weight measurement error
AD.description: Value of mesurement error to use for weights reported by the indicator as unstable.

AD.name: Poll interval milliseconds
AD.description: Number of milliseconds between queries of the indicator for new data.

AD.name: Request command
AD.description: Command to use to request information from the scale.

AD.name: Response pattern
AD.description: Regex pattern for parsing information responses from the scale.

AD.name: Connection retry interval seconds
AD.description: Seconds to wait between reconnection attempts.

AD.name: Command consumption delay milliseconds
AD.description: MilliSeconds to wait between attempts to consume commands sent on wires from other components.

AD.name: Send unstable weights
AD.description: Should unstable weights be sent to components?

AD.name: Animal Life Data upload record pattern
AD.description: Pattern to use for uploading life data. Watch out for the slashes!

AD.name: Data Synchronization Directory
AD.description: Directory to use for uploading and downloading animal life data records.

AD.name: Producer Scope for Animal Weight
AD.description: Producer scope for send out the Animal Weight Measurement.

AD.name: Producer Scope for Animal EID
AD.description: Producer scope for sending out the Animal ID number.

AD.name: Producer Scope for Enter Key
AD.description: Producer scope for sending out a state indicating that enter key was pressed.

AD.name: State Name for Enter Key Press
AD.description: The name of the state indicating that enter key was pressed.

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.
